body.name: LOSODONA 44” Phone Tripod Selfie Stick for iPhone with Remote, Extendable Cell Phone Tripod Stand with Phone Holder, Portable Tripod for iPhone Android Phone, Camera, Video Recording (Pink)

features: ⭐ 【All in 1 Selfie Stick Tripod】 Capture the perfect shot with this versatile selfie stick tripod. Hold it in your hand or set it up in a designated position to support your mobile phone. A nice steady balanced tripod for convenience of hands free selfies Group Photos, Face-time, Life-Vlog, Video shooting, etc.

📸 【Extendable & Foldable Selfie Stick】 Experience convenience at its finest with this telescopic folding selfie stick tripod. Extend it up to 43 inches for the perfect selfie, and easily fold it down to just 9.4 inches for easy portability. It is portable to take everywhere and is an indispensable shooting accessory, like travel and outdoor sports, to record different wonderful moments for you.

📸 【Detachable Remote Control】 Take control of your shots with the detachable Bluetooth remote control. Stay up to 10 meters / 393 inches away from your tripod and still capture amazing photos. Once connected and open the phone camera app to use it to take a selfie.

📸 【360° Rotatable Phone Holder】 Get creative and explore different angles with the 360-degree rotation feature. Your mobile phone can rotate freely, ensuring you capture every moment from the perfect perspective. The Phone clips to hold your phone are simple enough, you unfold the two little pads and extend the sprung end of the clip to hold your phone

📸 【Super Compatibility】This selfie stick tripod is compatible with Android 4.2.2 or newer, as well as iPhone iOS 6.0 or newer. It works seamlessly with iPhone 14/13/12/11/11 Pro/Max/XS/XR/X/8/7, Android devices, Galaxy S22 S21, Camera and more.
body.description: 44" SELFIE STICK TRIPOD Whether it's self-portrait, landscape photography or video recording, cell phone tripod can effectively reduce shaking and blurring.You can easily adjust the angle and height to capture different shooting effects, such as low angle, bird's eye view or portrait shooting.With a selfie stick tripod, you no longer need to rely on others to take selfies.Cell phone tripod is an indispensable tool for users who often record and broadcast videos. Provide stable support Multi-angle shooting Video recording and live broadcast Portable and Foldable Multifunctional bracket

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introducing the Portable 44 Inch Extendable Selfie Stick Phone Tripod with Wireless Remote! With its extendable and foldable design, this selfie stick is lightweight and easy to carry, making it the ideal companion for your trips and adventures. The dimensions of this stick range from 9.65 inches to 13.8 inches when folded, and it can extend up to an impressive 44 inches, giving you the flexibility to capture photos and videos from various angles.

Basic Parameter Compatible iPhone 14, 13, 12, 11,pro max ,Xr, XsCompatible Samsung Galaxy s23, s22, s21 Maximum Height: 44 Inches Minimum Height: 9.65 Inches Item Weight: 0.46 Pounds 44" SELFIE STICK TRIPOD Whether it's self-portrait, landscape photography or video recording, cell phone tripod can effectively reduce shaking and blurring.You can easily adjust the angle and height to capture different shooting effects, such as low angle, bird's eye view or portrait shooting.With a selfie stick tripod, you no longer need to rely on others to take selfies.Cell phone tripod is an indispensable tool for users who often record and broadcast videos. Provide stable support Multi-angle shooting Video recording and live broadcast Portable and Foldable Multifunctional bracket

This selfie stick also doubles as a stable tripod, providing you with even more versatility. Whether you're recording a video, engaging in a face-time call, or creating a captivating life-vlog, this tripod ensures that your footage is steady and professional-looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm impressed with the quality for such a low price.
reviews.reviewText: Very impressed with the quality of the product for such a low price! Very durable and easy to use!The remote is a little tricky to sync up with a phone but keep at it. It does work and work well once it links up which can be a considerable wait that first time.All and all a fantastic product for the price! I'm very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: It’s a decent tripod but the best part which would have been the selfie remote will not connect to save my life. Unfortunately the instructions are in Chinese. Once I translate in google translate, the remote still didn’t connect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Read thes befor you evaluate the product. The lack of a directions hurts this product. Price
reviews.reviewText: The old adage”you get what you pay for” is true here. But the price is right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The quality is great, very durable. The isy favorite, don't have to set timer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Barley fits my Iphone 14 Pro Max
reviews.reviewText: It BARELY fits my iPhone Pro Max... The phone pops out of it... not thrilled... Don't waste your $$$

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The selfie stick is solid feeling and operates smoothly. The stick comes with two batteries. The instructions that come with the stick are good. The remote clips nicely on the stick and worked on a Bluetooth timer off my cell phone.This is a welcome accessory for my cellphone. Durable and compact for transporting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For this price point, great value for doing hands free videos. Does not fit all phones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: it's a very good product but you pay for what you get. i ordered one and it came broken then got a 2nd one and it broke withing the first day but overall, a pretty good product.
